page.title: 18POPULATION IN PURTON STOKE
page.content: There are 192 people living in Purton Stoke (18 and over) 54 people are living on farms in this area. Nicholas Harding lived in 1279 and now the name is continued with 3 more Hardings'. John de la Welle lived on Wells Farm 1288,now the Moffat family live there. Names of people who supported the Quakers and Methodists( e.g. Thomas and Carter) still survive today . We have discovered that Mr.E.Clark bought The Reading Room(1973) from Miss Warrender of Purton Stoke House. Now 4 Clarkes' live at the same residence. Harding is an early 12th century name coming from an old word meaning 'hard'.It had Fitz in front of it eg Fitz Harding . Clerk was a scholar from Henry 1.
